summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Cashflow Application with 6-Month Projections feature. All backend API tests (16/16) passed. Frontend UI tests verified login, dashboard projections, transactions recurring badges, and form functionality.

minor.issue: Uses exchangerate-api.com which has a warning about bcrypt version in logs (trapped, non-blocking)

issues: Console hydration warnings about span elements inside table (th, td, tr, tbody). These are React/Radix UI rendering artifacts that don't affect functionality but should be fixed for clean HTML.

action_items: MINOR: Fix HTML hydration warnings in Dashboard.js projections table by ensuring proper React Fragment usage instead of spans inside table elements
seed_data_creation: Test user has 3 recurring transactions: Monthly Salary (+$5000), Monthly Rent (-$1500), Twice Monthly Groceries (-$200)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Backend API /api/projections is working correctly. Returns 6-month projections with account_projections, grand_totals, and summary. Frontend Dashboard.js shows expandable projections grid. Transactions.js has recurring checkbox and frequency dropdown. Test user already has recurring transactions set up for projection testing.

features_verified.login_and_authentication: PASS - Login with test credentials works, JWT token issued
features_verified.dashboard_projection_cards: PASS - 4 cards showing: Total Projected Income (CA$30,000), Total Projected Expenses (CA$11,400), Projected Balance (CA$18,600), This Month ($3,300)
features_verified.6_month_projections_expandable: PASS - Expandable section on dashboard shows CA$21,900 projected total in Jul 2026
features_verified.projections_grid: PASS - Shows accounts as rows, 6 months as columns (Feb-Jul 2026)
features_verified.grand_total_row: PASS - Shows combined projections in CAD
features_verified.transaction_form_recurring: PASS - Has recurring checkbox and frequency dropdown (monthly/twice_monthly)
features_verified.transactions_recurring_badges: PASS - Shows 'Monthly' and '2x/mo' badges on transactions list
features_verified.projections_api_structure: PASS - Returns months, account_projections, grand_totals, summary
features_verified.projections_calculations: PASS - Income $5000/mo, Expense $1900/mo ($1500 rent + $200*2 groceries) = Net $3100/mo
